title: Prevalence of sarcoidosis in Colombia: An analysis of the Ministry of Health databases
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 237

Author(s): Mario Alejandro Bautista-Vargas, Adrian Felipe Romero-Ocampo, Paola Andrea Cuestas-Grijalba, Juan Santiago Serna-Trejos, Laura Carolina Neira-Ruiz, Daniela Trujillo-Loaiza, Jennifer Alejandra Hurtado-Leiton, Diego Rosselli
